data.eml:eml: A new miniature species of Characidium Reinhardt (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Crenuchidae) from the headwaters of the rio Araguaia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Netto-Ferreira, André L., Birindelli, José L. O., Buckup, Paulo A. (2013): A new miniature species of Characidium Reinhardt (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Crenuchidae) from the headwaters of the rio Araguaia, Brazil. Zootaxa 3664 (3): 361-368, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3664.3.6
